description: A performance base layer specifically designed to wear with ski, snowboard, and mountaineering boots, the Rho Hybrid’s Phasic™ AR II, an engineered bi-component polyester material is designed to move moisture off the body, stretches and provides thermal comfort. Constructed from fibres spun around a durable nylon core, the 150gsm Merino wool panels are placed in high-odour areas – something appreciated on multiday trips – and the streamlined fit layers easily and is patterned for maximum mobility.
name: Arcteryx Rho Hybrid 3/4 Bottoms - Mens

specs.key: Contains wool certified to the Responsible Wool Standard (RWS)
specs.value: RWS is a voluntary program that helps sheep farmers meet consumer, retailer, and brand demands. The standard certifies they meet rigorous animal welfare and land management requirements

Next to Skin - Their most streamlined fit. It’s patterned to keep material as close to the body as is comfortably possible to enhance moisture management, thermal efficiency, and fit comfortably under layers
